mapper.select: SELECT gr_id as grId , gt_id as gtId, gr_rechargeMoney as grRechargemoney , gr_number as grNumber , gr_discount as grDiscount, gr_giveCount, gr_giveType, gr_startDate, gr_validDate as grValidDate , gr_upgradeType, gr_upgradeCount as grUpgradeCount, gr_equities ,delayDay, busId FROM t_member_giverule where busId=#{busId} and ct_id=#{ctId} ORDER BY gr_id ASC

select from t_member_giverule where busId=#{busId} and gt_id=#{gtId} and ct_id=${ctId} LIMIT 1
